recipesJson.name: Butterscotch Custard V1.4
recipesJson.author: Flyver
recipesJson.description:
Butterscotch Custard experiment for a bud. Will update recipe as i progress.

Added FA Meringue for extra mouthfeel.
Changed holy vanilla to shisha vanilla as it seems to come more through in this recipe.


It all seems to blend very smoothly. Friend is more than satisfied, I'm not though. More adjustments will soon come.

10+ Steep/homogenization days for best experience.
